org.sipdroid.media

Class JAudioLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sipdroid.media.JAudioLauncher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaLauncher

    public class JAudioLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
implements MediaLauncher
    Audio launcher based on javax.sound
